item.title: Group
item.description: Principal Investigator Marc Etherington Name: Marc Etherington Job Title: Assistant Professor Department: Mathematics, Physics and Electrical Engineering Office: Ellison D-Block 103 Email: marc.k.etherington ‘at’ northumbria.ac.uk Marc Etherington (b. 1988) started at Northumbria University in January 2020 as a Vice-Chancellor’s Senior Fellow in the Department of Mathematics, Physics and Electrical Engineering. In 2022 he became Assistant Professor and he continues to lead his research in the spectroscopic study of organic light-emitting materials.
